title: Batch Admin Hold All checkbox doing opposite of what it should
custom_steps: To reproduce:1. Login as boc_approver or any user with admin access2. Navigate to System > Batches (/ebisui/#/system-admin/batch-list)3. Expand the "Admin" section4. Check the "Hold All" checkbox to prevent batch jobs from running5. Refresh the pageExpected: Hold All is still checked and batch jobs are prevented from runningActual: Hold All is unchecked and batch jobs still runDev notes:This is a UI bug. The request body has ‰ÛÏisPaused‰Û� set to false when checking the checkbox and has it set to true when unchecking.

title: As a user I want it to be faster when updating user permissions on the user screen
custom_steps: Saving permission updates on the user screen takes a long time and we'd like it to be faster.AC* Screen is not as slow as it was

title: As a user I want to be able to sync reporting permissions to LDAP from the user accounts screen with a button
custom_steps: In order to force an update to ldap we will add a button to the bottom of the user accounts page "Sync LDAP Report Permissions"This process will kick off the ldap sync and update a users ldap permissions based on whatever is currently stored for the user.Clicking the button will bring up a confirmation modal saying: "This process will sync up reporting permissions for this user that are currently stored in the ebis database with LDAP.  This is a permanent action and cannot be undone"  with the normal confirmation options.This button will be visible in VIEW mode (the screen cannot be in edit mode)The process for this should be synchronous (so it may take a while) and results for what was changed in LDAP should be displayed in the browsers console.AC:* Button exists and can be clicked in view mode* Confirmation modal is displayed* Results appear in the console

title: As a User, I don't want to get 400 Errors when navigating through EBIS
custom_steps: Description:  This story is to resolved the cookies issue that causes users to get 400 errors when trying load player profiles and other pages in ebis.  The solution is to have them clear their cookies and cache.AC: - Cookie issues will not cause users to get 400 errors in ebis.

title: As a FAMA Batch User, I want ebis to track the date the social_media_consent_id was last updated
custom_steps: AC:* The table that tracks Social Media consent information will be updated to track the date social_media_consent_id was last updated so it can be referenced by the batch* Update when changed on Add C widget AND player profile

title: As FAMA Batch User, I want the option to only send players who have been updated since the last run
custom_steps: Related to [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-17363|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-17363|smart-link] Currently, the FAMA batch only sends all players who have signed, regardless of when they signed.AC:* There will be a new ‰ÛÏPopulation‰Û� dropdown added to the Fama Batch screen* The dropdown will be required* The dropdown will have two options:** All** Updated Since Last Run* Running the batch with ‰ÛÏAll‰Û� selected will run the batch with its current configuration (all players with consent flag set)* Running the batch with ‰ÛÏUpdated Since Last Run‰Û� will use the date the batch was last run in update mode and find players who had their social_media_consent_id updated after that date

title: As an EBIS Investigation Admin, I want to Edit a Level 2 Investigation
custom_steps: Data Discovery: - https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1828782224/Data+Discovery+-+L2+Consent+Form+-+AustraliaWire: - https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=l2_investigationAC: - When an existing L2 Investigation form is in view mode, there will be an edit button - Clicking the edit button will reload the form in edit mode

title: As an EBIS Investigation Admin, I want to Save a Level 2 Investigation
custom_steps: Data Discovery: - https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1828782224/Data+Discovery+-+L2+Consent+Form+-+AustraliaWire: - https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=l2_investigationAC: - When the investigation is in edit mode, there will be a save button - When the save button is clicked, any changes made will be committed and the form will be reloaded in View Mode - When the form is saved, any updates made to fields that are pre-populated from, or appear on, the player's intl profile, will also be updated on the profile - When the investigation is in edit mode, there will be a Cancel button - Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm their actions  -- If they confirm, the form will refresh in view mode (if it had been saved previously) or close and the user will be return to their entry point  -- If they deny, the warning will be dismissed

title: As an EBIS Investigation Admin, I want to select a trainer while creating an Investigation
custom_steps: Wires: - https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=l2_investigation - https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=select_trainer_agentAC: - When creating a new investigation, the Trainer/Agent field will be updated to be a select box as depicted in the provided wire - if the select box is clicked a modal will open, allowing the user to search the EBIS trainer/agent database for an existing trainer  -- Clicking Cancel or the X icon dismisses the modal - When an existing trainer is chosen, the Select button will become active - Clicking select will dismiss the modal and populate the trainers name in the field - Selecting a trainer/agent will populate the trainer/agent fields in the Consent Form Section of a L2 Investigation Consent Form

title: As an EBIS Investigation Admin, I want to create a new trainer while creating an Investigation
custom_steps: Wires:* [https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=l2_investigation|https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=l2_investigation]* [https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=select_trainer_agent|https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=select_trainer_agent]* [https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_a_new_trainer_agent|https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_a_new_trainer_agent]AC:* Users will have the ability to create a new trainer/agent profile from the new Investigation screen or the Select Trainer/Agent Modal* Clicking the 'New Trainer/Agent' hyperlink will open a new, blank trainer/agent profile** will match the provided wire* Clicking Save on the profile will create the new profile and return the user to their entry point* Clicking Cancel on the profile will close the profile and return the user to their entry point* The new profile will be searchable through trainer searchesNote: should follow workflow from intl ama profiles

title: As an EBIS Investigation Admin, I want to update Trainer/Agent Contact Information on L2 Consent Forms
custom_steps: WIre: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=l2_investigationAC: - When a Trainer/Agent is selected in the Investigation Info section of a L2 Consent Form, the contact information from the Trainer/Agent's profile will be populated on the Consent Form - The Trainer/Agent contact info will be editable - If any changes are made to this info, it will update the Trainer/Agent profile when the Consent Form is saved

title: As an LRD user I want to be able to change whether or not a payment is deferred on the contract payments tab
custom_steps: Cameron needs to be able to add payments which ebis doesnt considere to be deferred, such as Mookie Bett's signing bonus payments.  In order to allow for this, we will add a 'deferred' checkbox on the payment row which can be checked or unchecked as necessary.AC:* Deferred flag is exposed on the payments tab as a checkbox for each payment* User can change the value setting it to the appropriate value* Any payments flagged as deferred show up on the deferred comp funding utility* Changes to the flags made by the user are not undone by contract updates.

title: As a MJC Admin, I want small errors on the MJ Contract Terms Report Corrected
custom_steps: AC:* There are a series of small formatting errors in the Major League Contract Terms report on some relatively small matters. Specifically, the Rivera/Hoffman awards get cut off, there is often a #VALUE when awards with multiple and/or clauses are listed. All of these errors should be visible if the report is run over the last six months.

title: As a user I want MJC Roster Bonuses with "Active Days" selected for roster type to be system checked
custom_steps: MJC Roster bonuses with "Active Days" selected for their roster type should be checked as part of the nightly batches to see if they have been earned.An active day is defined specifically as a day the players MJ roster status is ACTIVE during the major league season.AC* A player with a Days on major league roster bonus set to roster type Active Days will earn their bonus after being active on the major league roster for the specified number of days during the major league championship season* A player with a days on major league bonus set to roster type Active Days will not earn their bonus if they are not active for the specified number of days during the major league championship season* A player with a days on major league bonus set to roster type Other will not earn their bonus regardless of how many days they have been active on the MJ roster during the major league championship season.* Major league championship season is defined as starting with the clubs first game of season and ending with their last game of the season (club season dates)* When the player earns a roster bonus, a notification that an other bonus has been earned will be generated on the clipboard* If a player‰Ûªs roster time is modified causing them to lose an already earned roster bonus, a notification that an other bonus has been unearned will be generated on the clipboard* Vesting and conditional options can ALSO use the new criteria and should be not earned/earned/unearned in the same manner

title: As a user I want to be able to select a type for Major Contract Roster bonuses
custom_steps: Major league contract roster bonuses are in general difficult to define.  Since the definition has always been varied, there is no way to automatically check to see if the bonus is earned.  In recent years standardized language has made them at least somewhat easier: most are now defined as days the player's major league roster status is ACTIVE.  The remainder are still not strongly defined, so those we won't be able to handle.In order to record which are now 'active days' vs anything else we will add a new criteria to the other bonus selection: Days on Major League Roster (Active Days)  Existing bonuses will have their criteria renamed to Days on Major League Roster (Other)AC:* There is a new criteria for Other bonuses: Days on Major League Roster (Active Days)* The existing criteria is updated to Days on Major League Roster (Other)* All existing bonuses are now using the (Other) option

title: When updating contract years all year clauses are not being correctly applied
custom_steps: When creating an award bonus package the only year option is all, when a place finished table is added to an MJC we includea table for every contract year. This is working as expected if the contract years are set first, if they are updated after adding the package the clause does not update correctlySteps to Repro:1. Login to ebis stg as Test-CLE-admin@mlb.com2. Locate a FA and create a major contract3. Add an award bonus package that contains a place finished table(CLE 4 clause combo)4. Add additional non option and option years5. Click refreshExpected:1. When refresh is clicked, All Years clauses will be added to each option and non-option year listed in the contractActual:A clause for each contract year is not addedExampleAward bonus added and years referred - [https://ebisstg.mlb.com/ebisui/#/major-contract/contract?mjcId=31007294&playerId=383689|https://ebisstg.mlb.com/ebisui/#/major-contract/contract?mjcId=31007294&playerId=383689]Years added first - [https://ebisstg.mlb.com/ebisui/#/major-contract/contract?mjcId=31007295&playerId=353917|https://ebisstg.mlb.com/ebisui/#/major-contract/contract?mjcId=31007295&playerId=353917]

title: As a MJC Admin User, I want an "Active MJC" column added to PLAYERS_ON_OUTRIGHT_VIEW
custom_steps: Related to: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-827.Description: This will be used to indicate if a player on outright has an active MJC or not.  User comment: "I agree that Jordan Stephens should probably be listed, but interestingly, he does not have an Active MJC"AC: - There will a new 'Active MJC' column added to PLAYERS_ON_OUTRIGHT_VIEW - If the player has an MJC in Approved state, the column will return 1 or Yes

title: As an MJC Admin, I want updates made to Assignment Bonuses
custom_steps: AC:* Under Assignment Bonus section on MJCs (Assignment Covenant), the following updates will be made:** The Criteria name will be changed from "Outright (Trade) / Waiver Claim Assignment" to "Outright (Trade)"** The Times Earnable default will be set to ‰ÛÏ1‰Û�** The Instances default will will be set to ‰ÛÏ1‰Û�** The Payor default will be set to "Assignee"

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to run a search for players that count against the Domestic Reserve limit from the MJ Summary Screen
custom_steps: AC: - On the MJ Summary screen, each Org will have a line item for "Domestic Reserve List Limit" - The number on this line will be a hyperlink - Clicking the hyperlink will open and execute an Advanced Search for all players in the Org that are counting towards their Domestic Reserve Limit

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to Advanced Search for Players Who Count Against the Domestic Reserve Limit
custom_steps: AC: - Under the Professional Players Advanced Search type, there will be a new "Counts Against Domestic Reserve Limit" filter added - Criteria for this filter will be "= Y" or "= N" - Choosing "=Y" will only return players who count towards the Domestic Reserve limit - Choosing "=N" will only return players who do not count towards a Domestic Reserve Limit - The filter will work with other filters

title: As an EBIS Admin, I want the layout of the Roster Widget flyover updated
custom_steps: Description:  With recent additions, the Roster Widget flyover has become cluttered and can be difficult to read.Wire:  https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=roster_widget_changesAC: - The layout of the Roster Widget flyover will be updated to match the provided wire

title: As a BOC Admin User, I want to save a previously saved Email Blast Template
custom_steps: Description:  Currently unable to save previously created templates without sendingWire: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=open_an_email_template|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=open_an_email_template]AC:* When opening a previously saved Email Blast Template, there will be a ‰Û÷Save‰Ûª button on the form* If User clicks Save, any changes will be committed w/o sending the blast to users* When the Save is complete, a blue save successful notification will be displayed and the user will be returned to the Email Template widget* Then edits will be reflected when the template is opened again

title: As a User, I want to open a sent email blast
custom_steps: Wires: - https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=email_blasts - https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=open_a_sent_emailData Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1603436609/Data+Discovery+-+HistoryAC: - Sent emails will be displayed in the History widget on the Email Blasts tab - There will be a paperclip icon that allows the user to open any attached files - The Failures icon will display the number of emails that were not received - There will be a download icon in the Failures column that allows the user to download the list of failed recipients and the reason it failed (if available) - The subject line will be a hyperlink - Clicking the hyperlink will open the sent email, which will match the provided wire - The email will not be editable - There will be two additional fields:  -- Sent (timestamp)  -- Sent By (username) - There will be a Close button, which when clicked, will return the user to the Email Blasts tab

title: As a User, I want to send an email blast
custom_steps: Wire: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_email_blast|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_email_blast]AC:* When viewing a new email blast or a saved template, there will be a Send button* Clicking Send will prompt the user to confirm their action* If they click Cancel, the warning will be dismissed* If they click Send, the email will be sent to all specified recipients and included all attached files* After the email is sent, the user will be returned to the email blast tab and a blue ‰ÛÏSent‰Û� notification will be displayed* User‰Ûªs will be BCC‰Ûªd* Sender will be EBIS XYZ

title: As a User, I want to open a saved email blast template
custom_steps: Wires: - https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=email_blasts   - https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=open_an_email_templateAC: - Saved email blast templates will be displayed in the Email Templates widget - The subject line will appear as a hyperlink - Clicking the hyperlink will load the template - Four additional fields will be displayed on a saved template:  -- Created  -- Created By  -- Last Saved  -- Saved By- There will be a Send and Save button on the template- Clicking the button will prompt the user to confirm their action  -- If user confirms:  --- The email will be sent  --- The email will be displayed in the history widget  --- Any updates made will be saved to the template  -- If user does not confirm, they will be returned to the template

title: As a User, I want to send an email blast with an attachement
custom_steps: Wire: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_email_blast|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_email_blast]AC:* There will be an attach file section on a new email blast as shown on the wire* Users will be able to drag and drop or browse for a file to attach* When a file is attached:** Filename, Last Modified, and Size will be displayed** There will be a trashcan icon displayed that will enable the user to remove the file* When the blast is sent, the email will contain the attached files as attachments* There will be a file size limit

title: As a User, I want to choose the recipient list on an email blast
custom_steps: Wire: https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_email_blastAC: - There will be two radio buttons at the top of an email blast:  -- Send to Everyone  -- Send to Specific Roles - If 'Send to Everyone' is selected, when the blast is sent, the email will be sent to all ebis users - If Send to Specific Roles is selected, a Roles dropdown becomes visible  -- The dropdown will be required if visible  -- This dropdown will be a multiselect and be populated with all ebis permission roles - If the email blast is sent with 'Specific Roles' selected, the email will be sent to users with the roles selected in the dropdown

title: As a User, I want to see the History on the Email Blasts tab
custom_steps: Wire:  https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=email_blastsData Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1598325107/Data+Discovery+-+Email+TemplatesAC: - On the Email Blasts tab, there will be a History widget - The widget will match the provided wire and data discovery

title: As a User, I want to see the Email Templates widget
custom_steps: Wire:  https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=email_blastsData Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1598325107/Data+Discovery+-+Email+TemplatesAC: - On the Email Blasts tab, there will be a Email Templates widget - The widget will match the provided wire and data discovery

title: As a Club Employee Permission Requests User, I want to see a Prospective Position column on the Employee Permission Requests Widget
custom_steps: Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789625/Data+Discovery+-+Permission+Requests+-+ClubAC: - There will be a new 'Prospective Position' column added to the Club version of the Employee Permission Requests widget - The new column will appear after the Requesting Org column - The column will be populated with the value entered into the field of the same name on the respective Permission Request form

title: As an BOC Employee Permission Requests User, I want to see a Prospective Position column on the Employee Permission Requests Widget
custom_steps: Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789348/Data+Discovery+-+Permission+Requests+-+BOCAC: - There will be a new 'Prospective Position' column added to the BOC version of the Employee Permission Requests widget - The column will appear after the 'Requesting Org' column - The column will be populated with the value entered in the field of the same name on the respective Permission Request form

title: INC0170878:  IL Summary Inconsistent on Combined Placements
custom_steps: Description: When choosing to combine placements on a IL Summary report, the report is inconsistent in how it populates the following fields: - Placed To - Placed On - Earliest Reinstatement - Transferred to the 60-day IL - Reinstated OnAC: - When running the IL Summary Report, if the user specifies "Combine Placements: Yes" the report should only use data from the most recent IL Placement when populating the following fields: - Placed To - Placed On - Earliest Reinstatement - Transferred to the 60-day IL - Reinstated On

title: As a developer I want to convert the remaining salary arbitration reports to crystal enterprise
custom_steps: The following salary arbitration reports need to be converted to crystal enterprise.  The front end should make an initial call to the ebis backend which writes the results into snapshot tables for arbitration.  The report will then be recreated in crystal enterprise using those snapshot tables.  All three reports should be able to run off of the samesnapshot tables.2+ and 3+ Salary Arbitration EligibilitySalary ArbitrationAC:* Reports are identical to their prior versions (with the caveat that any errors in the existing reports should be corrected rather than just carried forward)

title: As a developer I want to convert the CDF report to Crystal Enterprise
custom_steps: The CDF (Concussion Diagnosis Form) on the place on 7 day conc il needs to be updated to use a new view and crystal reports enterprise rather than 2016 and CDATA.  AC:* New report is identical to old CDF and runs off a view in crystal enterprise

title: As a BOC Admin User, I want clubs to get matches against registered underage players
custom_steps: Description:  As part of the Trainer Partnership Program, the BOC is registering some players that have not yet reached the age threshold for registration (14 years old).  They would like Club users to get matches against these players so they can add them to their Club Reg Lists.  Currently, if a Club tries to enter a registered underage player, they don't get a match, they get a hard error saying he hasn't reach the age threshold.AC:* If a club tries to enter a player under 14 years of age, a match check will be run prior to validating the players age* If a match is found, the possible matches will be returned* There will be a Ignore & Continue button on the modal* If the user clicks Ignore & Continue, the age validation will run and the system will return the hard error informing the user the player is too youngConfirm whether or not age check runs on save.

title: Update Intl Matching and Merging Logic
custom_steps: * If the player matches on National ID and Type then that‰Ûªs a 100% match* Otherwise, score last name, date of birth, first name, and birth city (if using dropdowns, city is either a full match or not a match, if its text, is uses the fuzzy comparison score)* Once you have each piece scored, they get pro-rated as such** If player did not come in from AMT and has a city entered:*** lastname score counts for 30%*** dob score counts for 30%*** city score counts for 20%*** first name score counts for 20%** If player came in from AMT and does not have a city entered, country is used for the location, but only counts for a small percent:*** last name is 40%.*** dob is 40%*** first name is 15%*** location is just 5%* If you get over X (we have to decide what x is, but 70% is probably good) that player will be returned as a match (as if they hit the 4/7 check before)All numbers will be easily configurable.

title: As a Intl Drug Testing Admin, I want to see updates to the Drug Test Request widget
custom_steps: AC: - There will be a new column added to both the Drug Test Request widget and the excel export of the Drug Test Request widget - The new column will appear to the right of the "Request Date" column and be titled "Test Creation Date" - The "Test Creation Date" column will display the datestamp of when the status of a request is changed from ‰Û÷Pending Review‰Ûª to ‰Û÷Consent Signed / Test Pending‰Ûª - The 'Org' column will be moved the far left of the widget, prior to player name

title: As a MNC Admin, I want report/code updated to include new Terms Resubmitted state
custom_steps: AC: - Identify any places that look for Terms Accepted or Update Terms Accepted state - Make updates to ensure Terms Resubmitted contracts are included with the others

title: As a MNC Admin, I want to receive a Clipboard Notification when a MNC is moved to Terms Resubmitted
custom_steps: Clipboard Notifications #9: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784810/Minor+Contracts+-+ClipboardAC: - When a MNC is moved to Terms Resubmitted state, a clipboard notification will be generated for the BOC - The Notification will match the requirements in the provided documentation

title: As an MNC Admin, I want Rule Checks to run when a MNC moves to Terms Resubmitted state
custom_steps: Rules: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784601/5.+Minor+Contract+-+onSubmitAC: - MNC On Submit rules will fire when a MNC is moved from Update Terms Accepted to Terms Resubmitted state

title: INC0168411 - As an MNC Admin, I want a new Terms Resubmitted state
custom_steps: Description:  Currently, if the BOC sends a Terms Accepted MNC back to the club in "Update Terms Accepted" state and the club resubmits, the MNC is returned to Terms Accepted.  This makes it difficult for the BOC Admin to know they need to review the updates.AC:* There will be a new Terms Resubmitted state created in the MNC Stateflow* It can only be accessed from the Update Terms Accepted state* Both Club and BOC users may make this transition* If the MNC is in "Terms Resubmitted" BOC may move it back to "Update Terms Accepted" or forward to "Terms Accepted"Flow:* Terms Accepted reject to Update Terms Accepted* Club resubmits to Terms Resubmitted (Rule checks run)* BOC accepts and returns to Terms Accepted.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want "newly signed" players to be called out on the MN Roster Report
custom_steps: AC: - Players who are flagged as "Newly Signed Players" (checkbox on player profile) will appear on the Minor League Roster Report with an asterisk next to their name - These players will be moved into the last group on the report (will Pending Active and Voluntarily Retired) - There will be a footnote added that reads:  "* Currently does not count against Domestic List Totals"
